title: Drawing, "Profile of Mountain Tops, and a Spaniel Dog, Lying Down.", July 1844
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed with date in graphite, at upper right:  July 1844 ; and again, at lower left: July 1844; and at lower left: Thistle head / thorns light yellow / thistle. 
Verso:  Inscirbed with date in graphtie, at lower right: dec. 1844
description:
Recto:  Horizontal studies of thorns and thistles.


Verso: Profile of mountain tops and a spaniel dog, lying down.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Profile of Mountain Tops, and a Spaniel Dog, Lying Down.", July 1844.
July 1844. Graphite on white paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1387.
